channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump orders feds to slash 10 regulations for every new one

item.title: Why Does Qatar Keep Helping Terrorists?
item.description: Qatar remains one of the world’s foremost proponents of violent Islamist movements and states. The U.S. should treat it accordingly.

item.description: Consumer lending is a growing sub-asset class in private markets. What are the unique challenges and opportunities for investors and policymakers?

item.description: When Democrats and the media say they're concerned about 'independence' in Trump's appointees, they mean they want insubordination.

item.title: For the Investment Professional: The Mindset Shift that Changes Everything
item.description: Whether you’re leading a team or climbing your own Everest, focusing on the journey will get you further than obsessing over the destination.
